verses.name: Genesis 46:8
verses.text: And these are the names of the children of Israel, which came into Egypt, Jacob and his sons: Reuben, Jacob’s firstborn.

verses.name: Genesis 46:9
verses.text: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.

verses.name: Genesis 46:10
verses.text: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.

verses.name: Genesis 46:11
verses.text: And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.name: Genesis 46:12
verses.text: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zerah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
